start.text: You are a guest at a royal ball. You are in love with the princess, but she is engaged to a cruel duke. You can either confess your love to the princess or challenge the duke to a duel.

confess.text: You confess your love to the princess and she reciprocates your feelings. You live happily ever after!

duel.text: You are no match for the duke in a duel. Your adventure ends here.
